description: Wilton Gregory is one of 13 new cardinals installed by Pope Francis at a ceremony on Saturday.
title: Wilton Gregory: Pope appoints first African American cardinal
title_page: Wilton Gregory: Pope appoints first African American cardinal - BBC News
maintext: The Archbishop of Washington is on the moderate wing of the Catholic church: a champion of racial equality and welcoming to LGBTQ parishioners, more in the image of Pope Francis himself as he continues to shape the college of cardinals in his image.
